root.name: CSI: NY
root.description: OverviewCSI: New York is the sixth CSI game to be released. It was developed by Legacy Interactive exclusively for the PC, and was released on November 18th, 2008.The game features a new graphic-novel 2D style, which differs from the rendered 3D graphics of previous games in the series. The game featured five crimes to work on, as well as an array of minigames; including physics simulation reconstruction and manipulating the X-ray scanner.

similar_games.game: Law & Order: Dead on the Money
